markdownRemark.html:
Today for the first time ever, the number of infected was less than the ones we had yesterday.
Italy's still the world second most hit country, but US is rapidly rising up in this sad leaderboard.

Worldometer says what follows

Total Cases Total Deaths Total Recovered Active Cases Critical
63,927 6,077 7,432 50,418 3,204

For the first time in two weeks (since we were locked down), I feel a sense of peace and I begin to see that future can be bright again.
Fortunatelly, my parents, friends and I are all safe and sound, but I'm with the victims of this tragedy, especially people who live in Bergamo and Brescia, which are Italy's most hit cities.
I will keep my finger crossed for the next days ahead.

#andràtuttobene
